cancelConfirm.title: Confirm Cancel
cancelConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to cancel the current process? Completed intermediate files will be kept in the temporary directory.

autoGlossary.label: Enable Auto Glossary
autoGlossary.desc: Apply extracted terms directly without manual confirmation. New terms will be merged into the active glossary (or a new one created).

glossary.label: Use Glossary
glossary.desc: Select an existing glossary to assist translation

diarization.label: Enable Speaker Diarization
diarization.desc: Identify and tag different speakers in audio or video

speakerPreAnalysis.label: Enable Speaker Pre-analysis (Experimental)
speakerPreAnalysis.desc: Analyze audio before transcription to identify speaker count and voice characteristics. Improves accuracy but increases processing time.

includeSpeaker.label: Include Speaker Names
includeSpeaker.desc: Show speaker names in subtitles (e.g., Name: Dialogue)

speakerColors.label: Use Speaker Colors (ASS)
speakerColors.desc: Assign different colors to different speakers (ASS format only)

visualStyle.label: Character Styled Translation
visualStyle.descEnabled: Adjust translation tone based on speaker characteristics (Formal/Casual)

enable.label: Enable Video Compression
enable.desc: High-performance H.264/H.265 encoding with subtitle embedding

crf.label: Quality (CRF)
crf.desc: Range 0-51, lower values mean higher quality. Recommended: H.264 (23), H.265 (28)
